items.sentence: In this country, any fool can be a governor, a representative or a senator.
The girl next to me on the plane started to get scared from the turbulence.
Tom is wearing the same shirt today that he's worn for the last three days.
There were a lot of things we wanted to do, but we didn't have enough time.
You're not the only one who's thirty years old here. Tom and Mary are, too.
